tp:docstring.p: User object encapsulates the necessary details of a user account including adding, updating and deleting user.

signal.name: unregistered
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when the user dbus object is destroyed and is no more usable.

method.name: addUser
method.tp:docstring: Adds the user info to the user's account database.

method.name: deleteUser
method.tp:docstring: Delete the user from the user's account database.

arg.name: rem_home_dir
arg.tp:docstring: Flag to indicate whether to remove the user home directory or not when user account is being deleted.

method.name: updateUser
method.tp:docstring: Updates the user info into the user's account database

method.name: updateMine
method.tp:docstring: Updates his or her own info into the user's account database

property.name: usertype
property.tp:docstring: type of the user. Type can be system(1), admin(2), guest(3) and normal(4)

property.name: homedir
property.tp:docstring: path of the home directory of user
